snippet: The Civilian Complaint Review Board substantiated the charge of excessive force against Officer James Frascatore and recommended departmental charges that can lead to suspension or dismissal.
abstract: Civilian Complaint Review Board finds New York City Police Officer James Frascatore used excessive force in arrest of former tennis star James Blake and recommends departmental charges, which could lead to suspension or dismissal; board also finds plainclothes Detective Daniel Herzog abused his authority in authorizing Blake's arrest.

keywords.value: Frascatore, James (New York, NY, Police Officer)
keywords.name: persons

keywords.value: Herzog, Daniel (New York, NY, Police Officer)
keywords.name: persons

lead_paragraph: The Civilian Complaint Review Board substantiated the charge of excessive force against Officer James Frascatore and recommended departmental charges that can lead to suspension or dismissal.

headline.print_headline: Officer in Tennis Star’s Arrest Used Excessive Force, Review Board Says
headline.main: Officer in James Blake Arrest Used Excessive Force, Panel Says
